actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, S. Rept. 93-1.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: An original bill to provide that appointments to the Cost of Living Council shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.

summary.text: Provides that appointments to the Office of Director of the Cost of Living Council shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.

titles.title: An original bill to provide that appointments to the Cost of Living Council shall be subject to confirmation by the Senate.
